item.title: New Release of Dynamic Analysis
item.description: New Release Andorid Dynamic Analysis # We recently released a new version of dynamic analysis for Android applications. Below you can find the changelog: New Android device based on Android 11, Improvements of Network Analysis Module, Update of Api Monitor Module, Full support for x86, x86_64, and ARM android apps. Contact us for trying the new Dynamic Analysis!
